title: Rs 1.42 lakh for one night stay! Navi Mumbai hotel prices get hot when Coldplay is around
description: Coldplay's upcoming concerts in Mumbai have sparked a massive demand for tickets and hotel rooms. Scheduled for January 18, 19, and 21 at DY Patil Stadium, the event has led to skyrocketing hotel prices, with some rooms costing over Rs 1 lakh per night. Many hotels are already fully booked.
